hero.title: Hand Crafted Pet Accessories
hero.description: Discover unique pet accessories meticulously crafted with embedded NFC technology, combining style with advanced functionality.

products.title: Explore the most loved Pet Products!
products.title_secondary: Take a look at our stunning collection of handcrafted pet products and find the the perfect match for your furry friend.

testimonial.title: I love the peace of mind that comes with knowing my pet's information is always accessible. The quality and design is also lovely! Pawsitive Collar has truly thought of everything!

about.title: About our Unique Pet Collars
about.about_description:
At Fashionable Pet Collars, we are passionate about creating stylish and safe pet collars.
 Each collar comes with an NFC Tag software solution that displays your pet's information when scanned.
 Handcrafted with love for your beloved pet.
about.block_1: Stand out with our trendy and fashianable pet collars
about.block_2: Keep your pet safe and secure with our advanced NFC Tag software
about.block_3: Never worry about losing your pet again, thanks to our innovative technology

features.title: Unique Features of Our Pet Accessories
features.title_secondary: Discover the innovative technology and stylish designs that set our products apart from the rest.
features.reason1_text: Each pet collar is meticulously handmade with passion and care
features.reason2_text: The integrated software solution displays your pet's information instantly upon scanning
features.reason3_text: Personalize your pet's collar with unique designs and colors

services.title: Our Services for Pet Lovers
services.title_secondary: Explore our range of services dedicated to keeping your pets safe, stylish and protected.
services.reason1_text: Create a one-of-a-kind product for your beloved pet
services.reason2_text: Our NFC software helps reunite lost pets with their owners
services.reason3_text: Experience the finest handcrafted pet collars on the market

reasoning.title: Why choose us?
reasoning.title_secondary: The reason why pet owners choose our handcrafted pet accessories with NFC technology for their beloved pets.

ctasection.title: Ready to upgrade your pet's accessories?
ctasection.title_secondary: Explore our collection of handcrafted products and give your pet the gift of safety and style.

contact.name: Name
contact.title: Get in touch
contact.paragraph: Have a question or feedback? Drop a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible

footer.paragraph: Keep up with the latest news and offers from Pawsitive Collar

about.label: About Pawsitive
about.paragraph: At Pawsitive Collar we believe that our pets deserve the best. That's why we have dedicated ourselves to creating high-quality collars, leashes, and accessories that are both stylish and comfortable for your furry companions.

history.label: Our History
history.paragraph: Pawsitive Collar was founded in 2024 by a team of pet lovers who were frustrated by the lack of high-quality, sustainable pet accessories on the market. We set out to create a brand that would not only provide the best products for our furry friends, but also prioritize eco-friendly practices.

sustainability.label: Sustainability
sustainability.paragraph: At Pawsitive Collar, we're dedicated to reducing our environmental impact. All of our products are made of sustainable, natural materials like cotton or recycled plastics. We also work with ethical suppliers to ensure fair labor practices and minimal waste.

team.label: Our Team
team.paragraph: Our team at Pawsitive Collar is made up of dedicated enthusiasts who are committed to providing the best possible products and experiences for our furry friends. Meet the founders and the key staff members who make it all happen.

hero.title: Let's 'Collar'-borate!
hero.description: Don't paws and ponder alone! Contact our friendly pack to fetch answers about our smart NFC collars that keep tails wagging safely. Whether you need support or just want to chat about our tech, weâ€™re here to help!
hero.follow: Join our pack on social media to stay updated with the latest trends, tips, and treats for your furry friend!

NotFound.title: Looks like you've lost your way
NotFound.title_secondary: No fear, our friend Molli can sniff out a better path.
NotFound.molli_message_part1: PS: If you've also got a pet called Molli, we would love to hear from you. Send us a pic or tag us on
NotFound.molli_message_part2: and we'll send Molli a shout!
